website_summaries.verdict: Satisfied customers love the hidden compartment, but also garners complaints about limited space and cumbersome design.
pros: Unique, patented 2-layer design that protects your phone and has a sliding credit card/license/cash holder
cons: Good if you only carry a few cards or cash

customer_reviews.title: My phone got ran over and survived!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few months ago and never felt the need to leave a comment because it's one of the many cases I have bought. It wasn't until today that I thought that I needed to get the word out. Today I dropped my phone in the middle of the street and noticed until I was on the other side. This case saved my phone and saved me 700$. BUY THE CASE! It's amazing, fits two cards, looks pretty & CLEARLY PROTECTS PHONES!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this case before I went on vacation, hoping to not have to bring along my purse everywhere. First off! It holds 1 maybe 2 cards. So that was disappointing. Second! I haven’t had this case 2 weeks and I dropped my phone just getting out of my car and the screen SHATTERED... I’m not talking a tiny scratch, it is no longer oprible. Mind you, I’ve had this phone for 2 years and it didn’t have 1 scratch. So if you want your phone to be protected at all, stay away.
customer_reviews.author: KachiriB

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Had this case for just 2 months and it's broken. I've never dropped it since having it. The case is very heavy but the joints are flimsy and the slider for the card holder held up to 2 months of normal use. Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: J. Ma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect phone case!
customer_reviews.text: This phone case has all the things that I was looking for. First, It is protective. I dropped the phone several times, but my phone wasn't damaged at all. (I attached the glass protection to the screen too) Second, It can hold the two cards! (It can hold up to three, but the phone becomes fat) I only have to bring the phone around if I go to the grocery shopping or somewhere else. But make sure you don't lose it :) Third, the color is pretty and cute! I highly recommend this cute and functional phone case!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Already returned...
customer_reviews.text: Not crazy about this case at all. Already returned. In person it is way more pink colored as opposed to rose gold as it appears online. The lip over the screen is not very big to protect the screen from drops. Most problematic, however, was when I put two cards in as the description says it holds, the plastic piece lifted up off of the softer peace as if the cards didn't fit. The opening was hard to slide open. On top of that I had to pay six dollars to return.
customer_reviews.author: HBS

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and functional. Case interferes with the flash so it has to be removed for photos in lowlight situations
customer_reviews.author: Quartknee

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I chose this phone case primarily because I recently got my license and kept forgetting it at home, so I needed a case with some storage. This case definitely fixed my problem. The storage on the back of the phone can fit about two cards, so if you don’t have that many cards that you constantly need it’s wonderful. The phone case is thick, but I quickly got accustomed to the size. The covering scratches a bit easily, but I’ve dropped my phone many times and my phone still hasn’t cracked so I’m very happy. Overall, I give the product an 8/10 and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP PLASTIC BREAKS
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic phone cover that keeps breaking when you slide open and close the case to get your cards! The first one i bought last a little over 2 months. I decided to give it another try, this one lasted just a month and already BROKEN. VERY CHEAPLY made and Does NOT do its job in holding in your cards without breaking. I’m so disappointed because I hardly even used my cards stored in the case!! I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS!!!!
customer_reviews.author: CYJS

customer_reviews.title: Offers mediocre drop protection
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this phone case and one by New Trent for my iPhone 8, and after trying out both, I feel the New Trent design is much better. First, the New Trent case is dual-sided, so it wraps the entire phone, leaving nothing vulnerable. This Spigen case only covers the back, so if you drop it face down (even with a screen protector), the chances that it will crack or shatter the screen is still higher. While I love the convenience of the card holder and the pink cover, I'm perfectly willing to sacrifice aesthetics for practicality. So, to people looking for a phone case that is durable and reliable, I recommend New Trent's!
customer_reviews.author: konjurer

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth case = no gripping hold.
customer_reviews.text: Gah. Pros: good case. Seems strong. The hidden card holder is handy! Only fits 2 cards, but it is also discreet because of this. Cons: THIS IS WAY TOO SLIPPERY!!!! I need some kind of rubber gripper or something so I don’t drop my phone so much!!! I feel like I can never get a good grip because the case is soooooo slick. I wish it covered more of my iPhone’s front by just a tiny bit, to protect the screen glass better. Or if I could find a tempered glass screen protector that would cover the entire face of the glass 🙄
customer_reviews.author: TreasuredBeauty5

customer_reviews.title: I also like how it has the compartment to carry ID and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have toddlers who play with my phone all the time, and drop it all the time. I’ve had cracked screens twice and spent $130 each time replacing screens. Since getting this cover, the edges are high and protect the phone and the screen. Thankfully with all the drops, only the case has gotten banged up but my phone and screen have stayed in tact. I also like how it has the compartment to carry ID and a card. On a quick shopping trip, it’s so much easier for me to only carry my phone and have essential items with me at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: LoveBooks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend these. However...They do not stand up against a pop socket and a 5 yr old boy who wants to play games! 😂 I super glued it but ... Seriously though, I love it. I just ordered another one. It worked great for 7 months, until...the boy! Mine holds my DL, CC & a paper insurance card just fine. Sometimes I fold a twenty over the top of a card and get away with it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Morris

customer_reviews.title: Broke less than 24 hrs later
customer_reviews.text: If I could Give this thing zero stars then that would be my review. First let me say the case was delivered on April 22 and I am writing this review on today April 23. Yes, that’s right. It broke less than 24 hours later. The card holder wouldn’t open properly and When I got it open I put the card in. Upon opening it to get the card out the whole back snapped off and broke. The only thing I liked about this case was the way the phone felt in my hand. The point of getting this case was to store my card in the back discreetly. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Rosenbaum

customer_reviews.title: Two Cards is a Stretch
customer_reviews.text: If your credit card has raised numbers, two cards do not fit comfortably in this case. With two cards, one with raised numbers, the "hinge" doesn't close completely. I purchased a different case because I wasn't confident in this case holding my cards securely.
customer_reviews.author: Spotlight Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh, I LOVE this case! It's well made, looks good, and holds my cards or (1) card and some cash. Totally a score on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not a good case!
customer_reviews.text: Two weekends ago, I was running and dropped my iPhone about 3 feet onto the side of the road. A crack developed in the upper left-hand corner. Then yesterday, the phone fell another 3 feet from my bathroom vanity and totally obliterated the screen. I have been a very loyal spigen customer for many years. This case is not your typical Spigen product. Good thing I have AppleCare. A new screen was $30. This case? Worthless if you’re a klutz.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds two cards
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my old case that held cards. I like this one better because it’s thinner and the cards seem more secure. The only thing I don’t like is that I really have to use my nails to remove my cards. It would be nice if the would slide out easier. I guess that’s a good thing since you won’t lose your cards. I also feel like if I moved the sliding part of the case wrong, it could easily break off. Overall, the case does its job. It holds two cards securely and protects my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I loved this phone case! It was the best for on the go because my card and id was with my phone and I didn’t have to carry a purse. But anything else besides my credit card and ID would overload it and it would break. It was easy to fix but yeah nothing more than two cards. Well I did like is that it didn’t mess with the chip in the credit card like others phone cases I have used in the past
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Klarissa Garcia

customer_reviews.title: An Otterbox Convert
customer_reviews.text: I've had Otterboxes for years, and finally swayed with ordering this case. It performs just as well, but the added storage compartment is perfect for attending concerts where they don't let you bring anything in with you. No need to bring your wallet anymore. Fits your ID and credit card perfectly, and after dropping my phone a few times, its protective qualities work well for your phone. Why spend $40 or $50 for a case? You don't have to anymore. This case is highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: See Me Cook

customer_reviews.title: Broke within the first hour of using it.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Put the case on my new phone, and within an hour of having it on, I had to take it off to have a screen protector put on it. It immediately broke into 3 pieces. If it broke this quickly, it would’ve only been a matter of time that it would’ve broken from pulling my cards in and out. I’ve had a the similar Speck wallet/card case for several years now, and the thing has been indestructible. Back to Speck I go. This is what I get for trying to save money for purchasing the Spiget case.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wilde

customer_reviews.title: Survives ANYTHING
customer_reviews.text: I just reordered this phone case. My phone survived falls at 30+mph (it feel out of my pocket while descending a hill on a bike) and it survived overnight in a snows storm, outside. All thanks to this case. After its last fall the case did fall apart but with no damage to my phone. I cannot believe how durable and protective this case is, if you are even thinking of buying it you should just go ahead and purchase now!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin A. Bidstrup

customer_reviews.title: Handy and durable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this case now for over a year. It does make the phone a little bit heavier and larger than an average case but it’s not detrimental. The sliding card holder is really handy. It can only two cards safely (though I have been able to squeeze in three it’s just trickier to open/close). I have dropped my phone many times and so far there has been very minimal damage. After about a year worth of fiddling with the sliding card holder it is starting to become looser, so I would recommend not pushing it open and closed when you’re bored. Overall, I am very satisfied with this purchase as it is handy and protects my phone well.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: A problem solver
customer_reviews.text: My partner was often forgetting her cards or her license or whatever when we went into town. But she never forgot her phone. The solution was the Spigen case now she always has the right cards with her all the time as long as she doesn’t forget her phone. The first case broke after a few months but didn’t have any qualms about ordering another one.
customer_reviews.author: August Dog

customer_reviews.title: Super cute & super convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Two things that I hate: 1-carrying purses and bags when I hang out and 2-Phone cases (it defeats the purpose of me opting for the sleek, sexy looking phone, right?) Well this case takes care of both of those problems. It's not all bulky and awkward, it's still very cute (although i wish that the whole case were rose gold, but i guess technology hasn't gotten that far yet). I love the little compartment for my ID and my atm card. I will always have my phone with me, but now i don't have to carry anything else.
customer_reviews.author: DesDotCom

customer_reviews.title: Protection and functionality at its best
customer_reviews.text: Adds a significant width and weight to the phone but it gives maximum protection. I bought it because I don’t wanna be carrying my wallet with me all the time. This case fits 2 cards comfortably and perhaps 1 or 2 paper bills; sometimes even 3 cards but it bulges out. I’ve had the case for more than a year now and had accidentally dropped it more often than I’d like to admit, but it has survived them all and so far only has few slight scratches on the case.
customer_reviews.author: Uruviel

customer_reviews.title: Not that convenient
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and would be good for holding things you don’t need to access that often (emergency cash, license) but I wanted it to hold my everyday credit cards (like my other case) which I use in practically every transaction. Getting the cards out wasn’t super difficult but definitely harder than my last case. The cover seems like it could break fairly easily. I’d say that there are other cases out there that do the job better.
customer_reviews.author: julesck

customer_reviews.title: Solid and useful case
customer_reviews.text: I've had this case for almost one month, and still loving it! Card slot works great, I only keep one card in it, but it is secure and not too much of a hassle to get out. I've dropped my phone a couple times (no bad drops yet though) and phone seems fine, a couple scuffs on the case but not noticeable. Buttons require more force to push, but still easy and accessible. Plenty of space around lightning port. Edge of case around screen is raised so that the screen and screen protector don't touch table surface when placed face down. Case looks nice! Rose gold color is slightly more baby pink than the phone, but its fine
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: A big WOW
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this case, it’s exactly as described and it looks amazing and impressive! The case fitted perfectly for my iPhone 8, actually it offers the phone more protection all around it, better than my own one. The card storing slide open and close no problem, it’s great when I go out with friends, or a run... no need to carry entire wallet. Color is perfect makes my case looks expensive and I’m loving it! No cons my friends just don’t hesitate and buy it that if my personal recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Princess K

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Durable and functional!
customer_reviews.text: this has been an excellent case for my iphone7. It keeps 2 credit cars and my license. I've dropped it and I just dropped the whole phone that was in this case in a lake by mistake. The phone and case survived and my credit cards and license were well protected. I am buying a second one just to have on hand because I have dropped my phone so much and expect this to break at some point. This is durable and super functional.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! It fits about 3 cards in the hidden compartment and because it has a little bit of an overhang lip in the front, it also protects your screen. I've dropped my phone numerous times in the month I've had this. The compartment closes securely so you don't have to worry about things falling out.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. C. K.

customer_reviews.title: Great case for a permit driver
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old daughter could not remember to have her wallet with her permit when it was time to drive. She liked to stick it in my car console or her dads and inevitably it would be in the wrong car. The case is sturdy and slim. It truly only holds two cards, but that is perfect for her. As long as she has her phone, she can practice driving!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this case for my new Iphone 7. This easily holds 2 credit cards or license and cc. I’ve even Tips Ken three bills in there instead, just had to tri fold so they would fit. Back is secure but is still easy to open. I had a similar model from another manufacturer in the past, much higher cost. I much prefer the Spigen model. My daughter liked it so much she bought one too. Hope they come out with some additional colors in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie In Bonifay

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: I've already dropped my phone a few times, and the cover really works to protect the glass, especially at the edges of the screen. I like the little storage compartment at the back, it holds 2 cards comfortably. It is a little heavy, but that's ok, it makes the phone easier to find. I recommend this cover to anyone who just wants to carry their phone, and maybe their drivers license and a debit or visa card. It's handy!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Cunniff

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels great
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of this case. The rose gold is pretty yet the black Fran is sturdy and stout yet sleek. It looks and feels really nice to golds the credit card slide door is very cool but a little cumbersome and kind of seems like it could break or fall off if not careful. I have a $20 in it now and it should be great to bring a card and ID around in. No screen cover though so must get that seprsestly.
customer_reviews.author: abby

customer_reviews.title: Max of 2 cards. 3 cards or cash is pushing it
customer_reviews.text: I liked it but it doesn’t fit three carts. I tried to put my drivers license and two credit cards in there and it makes the back pop off sometimes. With three cards it was very hard to get out the cards. I ended up throwing it in the trash and getting a different case. Excellent for 2 cards
customer_reviews.author: harmonie

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone Case!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this case. I purchased the blush color. I can fit 3 cards in it... My Id and 2 credit cards. I always have my phone on me and having this case eliminates the need for carrying my wallet/ purse around. The case has held up well. I actually bought another one because the first one I bought is a bit worn on the back at this point (over a year of use) However it still functions properly. The back slides out easily and secures back in place nicely. The case is not bulky at all. And I think the price is very reasonable. I highly recommend this phone case.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Ivory

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!! FLIMSY case!
customer_reviews.text: This case initially looked beautiful and sturdy. I must say that it was so convenient to have the sliding card holder built right into the case! HOWEVER, just one week after I purchased this case, my phone dropped from a table, (from not more than 2-3 feet height) and the sliding case portion broke right off! To my dismay, I was unable to fix it. I found that there were cracks in the case side as well. This is totally unacceptable for an item marketed as a protective case. It is USELESS as protection for a phone. Feels like I just wasted my money!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this case
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! It adds a bit of thickness to my phone, but it both protects my phone well and allows me to get out the door without a bulky wallet/purse. I got this case after switching iPhones. I've been using it for almost a month now, and it's holding up well. I frequently open/close the back compartment, and I can say that it easily holds an ID + credit card. If I need other items, then I'll bring a purse, but overall I like the convenience and design of this item.
customer_reviews.author: LY

customer_reviews.title: Aweosme case! It’s held up and met expectations
customer_reviews.text: I waited a few months to write a review to see how it held up and how I liked it after a few months. I love this case! It’s sleek and durable. The “click” action of the card holder is awesome, because you can definitely tell when it closes or not. I’ve had zero problems with it. I used to have a Splick case that held cards, and I prefer this one because the cards are completely concealed. It also is perfect for putting a pop socket on it. My only complaint is that is only holds 2 cards, but other than that it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Zwetzig

customer_reviews.title: Will not last very long
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed with this product. I was so excited to received it I’ve had it for about 3 weeks maybe and the part where you put the cards just broke and I was so angry because I had gotten one of those pop socket and I had spend a little bit over all and now I probably won’t be able to stick it to another case I’d have to get a new one. I’m wondering if I can get a refund or a new case because I’m just really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Love this case, so convenient
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone case! Fits two cards in the back (holds my ID and credit card). I’ve certainly dropped my phone with it and it’s been fine. Easy to hold. Very convenient and love the color (I got the rose gold one) only very minor complaint is if I’m running with it in my hand I can hear/feel the cards moving around but that is barely a complaint. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail S

customer_reviews.title: Good durability
customer_reviews.text: Coming from an OtterBox I was worried about its durability because I am always dropping my phone. Has held up nicely since buy it months ago. It can hold 2 cards. I wish it held more but oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Schoenberg

customer_reviews.title: This is my 2nd Spigen Slim Mirror
customer_reviews.text: I love the little compartment where I store my metrocard. Unfortunately, that is the weakest part of the case. After a fall, the back (metalized plastic) cracked and the cover of the compartment is loose and the metrocard is no longer safely tucked away. So, this is my second cover in 6 months, I changed color for good luck.... I hope it lasts until I move on to iPhone X or whatever comes after that.
customer_reviews.author: Irit

customer_reviews.title: Best Phone Case I’ve Purchased
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned MANY phone cases and this by far is my favorite. I love the functionality and slimness of the case. Most cases only hold 2 credit cards and you can sometimes squeeze a 3rd one in there. This case fits 2 credit cards and my drivers license easily. Best of all, it’s slimmer than most cases that only for 2 cards. I chose the rose gold color and it’s beautiful. A+ all around on this case! Now I just need another color!
customer_reviews.author: EKeane

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed this case! It is still slim enough to still fit in my pocket but holds three of my cards (a driver's license, a credit card, and a club card for a particular establishment), which is really all I use anyway. If you need it to hold more than that, this is not the case for you. But it is perfect for me! I also love the color, I have the pinkish-rose and black.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Alley

customer_reviews.title: Great case, I've been using it since 2017!
customer_reviews.text: So it's that time of year of a phone upgrade, as I've been using this case since 2017 and I'm planning to purchase the same design for my new phone, so due to it's durability and good quality, I decided to write an overdue review! This case is GREAT for the price, it's slim, durable, and it looks sleek. There have been several times that I've dropped my phone, and nothing has happened, to my phone or my case. I'm able to fit 2 cards, and pretty much it fits nicely in my purse or pocket. I can say that this case has been by far my favorite, and it's made with great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t even hold up for one month
customer_reviews.text: I thought Spigen would be reliable for a new case since I finally switched from the original iPhone SE to the larger 2nd gen one. Used this case for less than a month before the bottom-right corner on the back broke while I was sliding the door open. What a piece of crap. I guess this mechanism for storing cards isn’t durable.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Wife loved it and I liked it so much I got my self one. Phone will charge on cordless charger.
customer_reviews.author: aftermktplus

customer_reviews.title: Nice case for iPhone 8 with card holder
customer_reviews.text: Nice case for iPhone 8 with card holder! It can hold up to 3 cards and the bottom compartment slide open halfway only. That way, cards are not dropped accidently. It's bit bulky but after applying it to the phone it doesn't feel heavy. Volume buttons are easily operable but the one-off switch requires a bit of pressure! The problem was fixed when I added 3 cards I guess that occupied all empty space and reduced the play between case button and phone button!
customer_reviews.author: Sudarshan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, convenient and sleek!
customer_reviews.text: This holds 2 credit cards tucked inside. It’s perfect for having with me at all times. The only issue I had was trying to open the slot the first time. It slides left and right, I tried to open it like a door. It was hard to put back together but hasn’t come apart again.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Corey

customer_reviews.title: Best phone case ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is truly my FAVORITE phone case. I love the secret compartment so I can keep my drivers license, credit card & a $20 bill with me at all times, without having to stuff or fight my way to in order to get to it, like previous phone cases I have purchased in the past. I Highly recommend this case, & will be purchasing another just like it for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Battery severely depleted
customer_reviews.text: The phone looked great and operated fine but once I got everything up and running I come to find out that the battery's life was severely depleted and only held a 71% charge. I expected some depletion but per the guarantee with the phone, it shouldn't be lower than 80%. I've returned it and there were no problems. Ended up just going to Verizon to get a new phone so I didn't end up in the same predicament.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Weise

customer_reviews.title: Favorite phone case
customer_reviews.text: I've been jumping around between phone cases with options to hold a few cards with me on the go. After reading positive reviews I tried this because I had gotten tired of the fabric stick-on pocket I had been using. I've had mine for 3.5 months. This is absolutely my favorite case I have purchased. Though it takes a second of effort to remove them, it fits 2 cards perfectly. I've dropped my phone a few times and the case has protected it very well. Even with the protection and card pocket it is still very slim and easy to hold. I've personally recommend this to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: My phone survived a 7 floor drop onto concrete
customer_reviews.text: I live on the seventh floor of my apartment building and was talking on the phone when it slipped out of my hand. The next thing I know it's falling slow motion down to the parking lot below me (luckily it didn't hit a car). I knew with 99.999% confidence that it was a goner but screamed and ran downstairs anyways. I picked it up and the case was broken but the much more expensive phone underneath it was working perfectly. It was a straight up miracle. Luckily I had a screen protector on it too so my screen was free of any scratches. HIGHLY recommend a case that survives a 7 foot drop onto concrete.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line brand and case
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and dependable case. I had this same brand for my iPhone 6 & that one worked so well for my husband & I’s previous 2+ yrs that we definitely knew to go with the same case again when we upgraded. This product isn’t bulky either and stylish too. This same case was for sale in AT&T for DOUBLE than what Amazon offers it for btw. Protect your investment and buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I love my new phone case
customer_reviews.text: I love my new phone case, and I love that I can store money or cards in the back of it, but the bad part about it, is that the back is quite flimsy. Good thing I was at home but I didn’t realize the back was partially popped off and my money fell out. I snapped it back together, but the back is flimsy and feel I have to keep checking it, especially if I’m out in public.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Can’t say enough good about it!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this case. Holds my ID and one credit card perfectly. Can fit another card in there but it’s a little tight. Easy to open when needed but clicks in place so it doesn’t open on its own. Still able to wirelessly charge my phone with the cards in it. Not bulky at ALL. Dropped my phone a couple times and no damage to phone or case. Sometimes the slide feels a little flimsy, but at the price I think it’s fair and I would have no problem purchasing another one. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren R.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but design flaw cracks case
customer_reviews.text: This is now the second case of this design that I’ve owned and I want to love it because it is a slim profile and still holds two cards and a cute color, however after regular use it keeps cracking in the same place as shown in the photo so I think it’s a design flaw
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for when you don’t want to carry a purse
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite phone case. Great for when you don’t want to carry a purse. Mine holds three cards, no problem. I purchased it in rose gold and receive so many great compliments. I highly recommend this product. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KCDJH

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my iPhone 7 and it fits great. The case is a little bit thicker than my old case but it is not uncomfortable to hold at all. The slide away pocket in the back is deep enough to hold up to three cards. I can easily close the door with my license, credit card and debit card in there. The door stays shut with no problems. I really like this case!
customer_reviews.author: jesskam

customer_reviews.title: Quality case so far!
customer_reviews.text: So far much better than my old speck. Seems durable and doesn’t dirty like the material on speck cases. It does not slip out of my hand like others have said, however since I am female and none of my clothes have decent pockets... so when I’m working out I slip it in the side of my leggings and it tends to slip down and my speck did not do that. It’s only a minor inconvenience and I wouldn’t consider it to be such an inconvenience that I would remove a star from the review.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer 21

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone case
customer_reviews.text: durable - i drop my phone all the time and it never breaks or cracks. i've had this case on it for over a year. Convenient - i keep my metrocard and my office building ID in the back for easy access and scanning through turnstiles. i could cram maybe one more card in there before it gets too full. i love it!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and practical
customer_reviews.text: Study case! Loves that it holds 3 cards! Great color. Easy to hold with grip material on edges of the case. I am very clumsy and I drop my phone at least 2 times a day. The phone has not cracked or broken. I do have a screen protector on my phone which I think is necessary to add to the case...for clumsy people!
customer_reviews.author: Ramsha Khan

customer_reviews.title: Broke after two months
customer_reviews.text: My daughter enjoyed this for two months (it was a Christmas gift) but then the back enclosure broke off. Her previous Spigen case lasted years, this one broke after the back enclosure was only open and closed a few times (she only kept one $20 bill in there, tightly folded, so it wasn't overloaded).. Returns are only possible for a month, so we are out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: arlington

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone case for about 6 months and it has held up very well. It's very light weight and fits nicely in your hand. It also protects pretty well against cracking the screen, as I drop my phone all the time and it never has broken yet!! The back sliding door has not broken or gotten stuck yet. It can hold 3 cards MAX. Anything more and the door doesn't close all the way and starts to bend. The rose gold is a very nice color as well.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: This is my second one
customer_reviews.text: I loved my first one so much that when I upgraded my phone there it was a must have. The case protects my phone every time I drop it (I use a glass shield with this), looks great, and the back fits my license and cc making travel so easy! I have had others where the back door doesnt stay together or slide easily. This one has been amazing.
customer_reviews.author: sje123

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I will only order this phone case from this seller because the last time I ordered it it was from a different seller and it was so cheaply made and clearly a knock off but this one is perfect and I’ve dropped my phone a bunch of times and it still works!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Benedict

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: I really like this case Now I don't have to worry about forgetting my id or card when I leave the house. It is hard to have 3 cards in there, that's why I gave it 4 stars but it is still worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Love this cover!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased my 2nd Slim Armor. The first one lasted a little over a year. I can’t count the number of times I have dropped my phone and it’s never been damaged. The only reason I needed to replace it was because I dropped it while I had the card holder open and the slide broke. This has been my favorite cover because I carry my debit card and my ID in my phone and it is not bulky like other covers. I do recommend getting a face cover to protect from scratches as this product does not come with one.
customer_reviews.author: leslie masenten

customer_reviews.title: Great for On the Go
customer_reviews.text: I love this case and get lots of compliments on it. I keep my main card, license and key card to building in it which is great so I don't have to always have my whole wallet out. It will break off if you try to put more then 3 cards in. Pretty easy to fix when it does that. Scratches on it but fairly durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT CHOICE FOR PHONE PROTECTION - LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten a ton of compliments on this case, and the biggest compliment is the one I would give it myself. SO, so durable, after numerous drops. Absolutely comparable to Otterbox or LifeProof in terms of outer protection (other than the screen coverage). This product does have a raised edge however, so with the addition of a tempered glass screen, your phone is good to go, and the sliding back for cards is just as effective and tight locking as it was when I very first ordered it. Very satisfied with the product, already recommended it to several other people, and would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Thin but great storage!
customer_reviews.text: This case is thin enough to work with my everyday activities but it’s reallt nice having the option to slide a gym card or debit card in the slot if I done what to bring a wallet or purse in somewhere. My pop socket sticks fine on the slider door. Room for one card, 2 makes it a bit awkward to close.
customer_reviews.author: ItalianSis

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Received my new phone case a few days ago and, so far, so good. I was apprehensive that, having a moving part (the little cover), it might feel flimsy or even break right away. That didn’t happen. It’s nice looking, (I got the rose gold), and seems sturdy. I’ve already used the cover to hold my license, a credit card, and some cash, and it works great. Mind you, this is definitely not a replacement for your wallet, as it would not hold more than what I listed, but it is a very convenient feature., and at a great price. It also holds the phone securely. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy case for Model 3 owners
customer_reviews.text: This is my second case. The slide broke in my first one since I used it so much. My first case lasted about 1.5 yrs. I really like this case because I can keep my Tesla key card with me at all times. So if I’m parked in a underground structure and don’t have cell service to start my car with my phone. I will still always have my key with me.
customer_reviews.author: Strawberriemllk

customer_reviews.title: Best phone case I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this phone case. It’s slim and stylish and the back compartment fits my license and one credit card. It has protected my phone from a few drops on the ground (I don’t drop my phone that much though). I will never use another case!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Too slippery & disht like black on rose gold colors.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of this, but after trying it I realized I didn’t like the black colored bumper against the rose gold. Purely aesthetic reason. Also was a bit more slippery than what I’m used to. Ended up nixing idea of card holder & bought a Speck case with grips. It’s the brand I’ve used since Iphone5 and what feels best for my hand.
customer_reviews.author: sfmom

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this case for several months and love it. It doesn’t hold more than 2 credit cards at once but that’s all I need it for. It’s especially helpful when I am going to grab lunch at work or run into the store real quick and I don’t want to take my big purse. Some reviews say theirs broke easily but I have dropped mine many times and it’s protected my phone. I do have an additional glass protector on my phone so that may have helped too but the sliding door holding the credit cards has held up nicely. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: saj73

customer_reviews.title: Two years and going strong!
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of this product as well as the durability. I love the back pocket. You can not fit more then one or two cards in the slot depending on width but still very efficient. No issues and no damages. I have dropped my phones hundreds of times and still standing!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Ann

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying this phone case. I've had the first one for more than 2 years and dropped it a few times (indoors, outdoors, pavements, clubs) which only resulted in scratches on the case. I recently dropped my phone on the pavement and it broke, but considering it lasted for more than 2 years is pretty good. My phone itself never cracked on the front or back. I love how durable and sturdy it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very slim, my favorite new accessory so you don’t have to worry about your cards slipping out or having to carry a purse! Very sturdy!! My husband accidentally lifted the flap Instead of sliding it on day 2 and we were able to get it back into place and it works great with no loosening, even with our mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Webber

customer_reviews.title: Freedom! : D
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this case. It holds my driver's license and one credit card, but that's really all I need. It's still slim enough to slip into my back pocket. It so far seems to be resistant to scratches and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: N. Corwyn

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty good, lightweight case that doesn't add a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good, lightweight case that doesn't add a lot of bulk. You can only fit about two cards, or an ID and one card in the slot (I haven't tried more than that). Note that the place where you put the cards SLIDES rather than hinges open (easy to snap back on if you make the mistake I did). The color is nice, and I think it will be durable.
customer_reviews.author: LMarie

customer_reviews.title: Great to hold cards just don’t drop it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this case to carry my Id and a card with me. It’s ok to protect but I was disappointed when I had to replace my last one after my phone only fell off my desk. As long as you don’t drop your phone it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay case
customer_reviews.text: I got this case for my new iphone. I needed something that can hold my ID/credit card, etc. This case is decent, but can only hold TWO cards before you see a budge in the back (aka you'll break something). The case is also quite slippery. If my hands have NO moisture on them, the phone can slip off my hands easily.
customer_reviews.author: L. Y.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I think it works well for what I needed. It holds only 3 cards, which is fine for me. I’ve dropped it quite a bit and it’s still going strong. No breaks, cracks or scratches. The look is cute too. It’s simple and convenient. I liked it
customer_reviews.author: Lorlee

customer_reviews.title: I've stopped carrying my wallet!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a klutz and drop my phone constantly, so this + a glass screen protector has kept my phone looking like new! The side buttons are responsive and it doesn't impede the side switch for turning the ringer off. Most importantly, the back case is just large enough to fit my ID, debit card, and insurance card nice and snug. Now my biggest worry is losing my phone 😅 It does make the phone a bit bulky for my small hands, but I added a matching pink pop socket to solve that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Compact and durable
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty compact case, considering the compartment in the back that is deep enough that I've been able to fit 3 credit cards in addition to keeping my adhered magnet for the car dashboard phone mount! Have dropped it a bunch of times and no cracks. Is precisely the same rose gold as my iPhone 7. You need to buy screen protector separately
customer_reviews.author: kamr

customer_reviews.title: Love this case!
customer_reviews.text: My husband talked me into an iPhone after many years of Android. I told him he had to find me a case I would love before buying the phone and he did! I love this case. It keeps the phone slim in size but still allows me to carry my ID and debit card. I have had multiple complements on the case and it functions very well. I have had no functional issues with it, the back slide just fine and the camera area keeps the camera lens well protected. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great Case for Protection & Holding Card(s)/ID
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend to help protect her replacement phone since her previous phone cracked after she dropped it and she had a different plastic case then. Great protection all around and she loves being able to have her ID and a credit card with her phone and not have to carry her wallet around when we go out to places around town. She has to remove her cards to use the wireless charging but never has to remove the case so she loves it! Would highly recommend this case to friends & family!
customer_reviews.author: William Tang

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The compartment to hold ID or credit card slides to open. No instructions came with it and I pulled it off trying to open. Luckily it went back together and still works fine
customer_reviews.author: Boo

customer_reviews.title: Only a Spigen case household
customer_reviews.text: We switched to Spigen cases 6 years ago when my daughters phone cracked and was in an otter box. Will never use a different brand. The quality and design is superb. I have thrown my phone across a concrete floor (not intentionally) and not a thing happened to it. I was very excited to see a new Spigen with a slide card slot. Holds my DL and debit card. Still able to use wireless charging. I have forgotten to take my cards out a few times before setting it on the charger and they were fine afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my case. I’ve dropped my phone a few times now and it’s still intact. The space for your two cards is so convenient. I always carry my DL and CC. It has never “just opened” accidentally, so it’s very secure. Nothing else will fit, not even a neatly folded bill lol... I tried it. It’s durable and love the color. I highly recommend it and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Candida Muro

customer_reviews.title: Great case, wouldn't recommend for a popsocket.
customer_reviews.text: Love this case and the fact that my cards aren't on display. I have a popsocket on it, and one of the reasons I chose this case was so I could still use the popsocket. The slide is surprisingly sturdy, but it has popped off once. Pretty sure it will eventually break. But If I didn't have a popsocket on it, I'm confident this wouldn't be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: My mom loves the one I bought her
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom for her birthday a little over a year ago and she still uses it and hasn't taken it off since. She likes the color, but better yet she loves to be able to forgo her purse if she needs to run out of the house for a quick errand because her cards are discretely located in the back compartment. She recently considered upgrading her phone, but expressed that she would be sad getting a new phone because she wouldn't be able to use this case anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Morrissette

customer_reviews.title: Best case ever
customer_reviews.text: Best case ever! Having the functionality of a wallet is so nice when I want to run into store and not be weighed down by a purse, because I ALWAYS have my phone. Fits 2 cards (or ID and a card or cash and - card). It’s been dropped a few times & hasn’t broken. Really expected much less for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Susie D

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this product. Recommend this case
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint I have is that at first I struggled with getting the hard holder open. This is a good thing not having to worry about if a stranger can get it open easily if the opportunity would ever happen. Difficult to get off but that means it fits snug and securely
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Case is good if you are ok with a little bulky case
customer_reviews.text: Case is good if you are ok with a little bulky case. I have 2 problems with this and had to return even before I use. 1) It is bit bulky than usual Spigen armor cases(I am using spigen cases for at least 2 years now and love them) and 2) I cannot use this with my magnetic phone car mount. If you do not have these problems then this is definitely a wonderful case.
customer_reviews.author: gugg

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It does make phone significantly bulkier, but that’s expected with it being able to hold 2-3 cards in the back of the case. Not unreasonably heavy either. I’ve been using it for over a year, and the sliding part still slides super smooth. With how much I put it through daily, there’s no visible wear and tear on the case, and protects my phone every single time. So now I just take my phone case along with me to lunch everyday. No heavy duty wallet needed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Case | Wonderful Price | Quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 14 yr old daughter. Love how it can hold a few things inside the case. Not bulky. Comfortable. She has a pop socket that is on the case and doesn’t block the sliding part. At first the case was slightly difficult to put together. She’s dropped her phone 3x and it did it’s job of keeping the phone safe. However, the sliding piece popped off, but was easily put back on.
customer_reviews.author: Christina A

customer_reviews.title: Passed the drop test for sure!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone case! Beautiful rose gold, holds my bus pass and credit card which is soooo handy as I go to university (I don't have to carry my purse). And it is SUPER durable. Today I was at the bus stop texting my husband when...I dropped my phone, it hit the street, bounced up and HIT A PASSING CAR, then hit the pavement again! I picked it up...not a scratch!!! Wow. That was certainly worth the price!! I've had it 6 weeks--and it's made my life better!
customer_reviews.author: kysr

product_meta.title: Spigen Slim Armor CS Designed for Apple iPhone SE 2020 Case/Designed for iPhone 8 Case (2017) / Designed for iPhone 7 Case (2016) - Rose Gold
product_meta.description: Color:Rose GoldBolstered protection meets practical storage in the Slim Armor CS. Its dual-layer structure is designed to be pocket-friendly, with Air Cushion Technology packed into every corner for extreme defense. The back slides open for quick and easy access to cash or card storage. Even with all of the extra protection, the case remains slim and pocket-friendly.
feature_bullets: Slim Dual Layer Wallet Design and Card Slot Holder
Absolute Protection = Dual Layers + Air Cushion Technology
Exterior card slot holds up to 2 cards
iPhone SE 2020 Case / iPhone 8 Case / iPhone 7 Case Compatible with Apple iPhone SE (2020) / iPhone 8 (2017) / iPhone 7 (2016)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars4,051 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
